const git_oid* git_tag_id ( git_tag *  tag)

Get the id of a tag.

Parameters:
taga previously loaded tag.
Returns:
object identity for the tag.
int git_tag_lookup ( git_tag **  tag,
git_repository *  repo,
const git_oid *  id 
)

Lookup a tag object from the repository.

The generated tag object is owned by the revision repo and shall not be freed by the user.

Parameters:
tagpointer to the looked up tag
repothe repo to use when locating the tag.
ididentity of the tag to locate.
Returns:
0 on success; error code otherwise

int git_tag_new ( git_tag **  tag,
git_repository *  repo 
)

Create a new in-memory git_tag.

The tag object must be manually filled using setter methods before it can be written to its repository.

Parameters:
tagpointer to the new tag
repoThe repository where the object will reside
Returns:
0 on success; error code otherwise
